heading: HR00458
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO DRAFT A PATIENTS' BILL OF RIGHTS AND TO POST THE SAME AT THE ENTRANCE OF EVERY HOSPITAL, CLINIC, AND OTHER HEALTH CARE FACILITY AND IN OTHER CONSPICUOUS AREAS THEREIN

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00458
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO DRAFT A PATIENTS' BILL OF RIGHTS AND TO POST THE SAME AT THE ENTRANCE OF EVERY HOSPITAL, CLINIC, AND OTHER HEALTH CARE FACILITY AND IN OTHER CONSPICUOUS AREAS THEREIN
